data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
"This class facilitates building frameworks of several classes that
    inter-operate. It was first designed and built for C<HTML::Mason>,
    in which the Compiler, Lexer, Interpreter, Resolver, Component,
    Buffer, and several other objects must create each other
    transparently, passing the appropriate parameters to the right
    class."

    I could have called it Class::Framework or something, but that
    doesn't work as well as @MyMod::ISA = qw(Class::Container);
